column5: Hey Guys, I was a somewhat frequent contributor back in the 2000s and then took a long break. Fished out of Grassy Narrows on LOTW. Wondering if any of the guys like PJM, Eastwind, Bill Krejca and Hot Runr Guy are still around. I see REW is at 36,000+ posts and still dispensing invaluable information. I hope all of you are well, and we will wet our lines soon. Rockpt
Good to see back. Many moons ago, you were one of the first people on the internet that helped me with fishing info.
Glad you are back kicking in some information againI hope all is well. Driftersifter
And your excuse for being so tardy????? Ah who cares, glad to have you back in the fold.
